meanings.definition: A device that allows for two-way communication within a building or group of buildings.
meanings.sent1: The intercom in our school helps us talk to the office easily.
meanings.sent2: The intercom crackled to life with an announcement about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: When the intercom started playing music instead of announcements, we all danced in the hallway.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the intercom, brightening up the entire building.
meanings.sent5: The intercom buzzed loudly, making sure everyone heard the important message.

meanings.definition: To communicate using an intercom system.
meanings.sent1: We can intercom each other from different rooms in the house.
meanings.sent2: He intercoms the security guard whenever there is a suspicious noise.
meanings.sent3: The siblings like to intercom jokes to each other through the intercom.
meanings.sent4: She intercommed her excitement about the news to her best friend.
meanings.sent5: The team intercoms their strategies before every important game.
